name: Dec 2nd, 2023: Meeting Recording Sharing as a Service
summary: Zoom Recording Sharing Service Weâ€™re distributed by design, which means our company policies and values revolve around how to best work when Elasticians are spread around the world. One consequence of this design is that communication is challenging - getting everyone on the team across 14 time zones on a call regularly is not reasonable.  We counter this by taking things async when possible but acknowledge that a synchronous video call has its place. In many ways this is even an advantage, a...
